name: Magic Aliens
description:
You have the power of destruction magic and that pesky victory flag is running away. Demolish any alien in your way. One man (me :D) project with a lot of random assets from online (especially mixamo) made for the 2nd Curdle game jam!

WASD - Movement

Space - Dodge

Shift - Sprint

Mouse Buttons - Magic

P - Disable Post-Processing (Little Buggy but good if you need the FPS)
